page.title: 14BIOGRAPHY
page.content: My life as a working mother is a very busy one. Ihave 4 sons aged between 10 and 22.My job as a senior librarian at Onger Library is very interesting.My husband is a London Transport bus operator.My day starts at 6am when I wake.I prepare packed lunches for five.After having breakfast,I do the laundry,we feed our pets.By 8.30am we are ready to leave home.We have 4 cars as we all need transport to go to work.After taking my younger sons to school,Igo on to the libraryto start at 9am.Ido some shopping in my lunch hour.leaving work at 5pm,I get home and start making dinner for the family.The families favourite meal is the Sunday roast.We rely on electricity a great deal,having an electric kettle,cooker,radio etc.In the evenings,I do the ironing and watch the TV or video.I'm in bed at 11
